title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Add peacemaker as another role to your growing list of titles and talents. You can easily see where your buddies are talking past each other today, whether online or in real life. However, your forte rests in your current ability to deftly broker goodwill and calm while the tactful Libra Moon charms your 11th House of Social Networks. Fortunately, a mix of humor, candor, and genuine affection for your friends enables you to appeal to their hearts, if not their common sense. The art of diplomacy is not a lost cause. Songwriter Jill Jackson wrote, Let there be peace on Earth and let it begin with you. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
